definitions.definition: A distant view or prospect , especially one seen through some opening , avenue or passage .
A site offering such a view.
A vision ; a view presented to the mind in prospect or in retrospect by the imagination.
examples: a vista of pleasure to come

main_definition: A distant view or prospect , especially one seen through some opening , avenue or passage .
secondary_definitions: A site offering such a view.
( figuratively ) A vision ; a view presented to the mind in prospect or in retrospect by the imagination.
